title: How to make delicious Chilaquiles quick and easy!
description: Chilaquiles is a traditional Mexican breakfast dish consisting of corn tortillas cut into quarters and lightly fried.

ingredients.first: Twelve corn tortillas, preferably stale, or left out overnight to dry out, quartered cut or into six wedges
ingredients.fourth: One One&Half to Two cups red chile sauce or salsa verde, store-bought or homemade
ingredients.fifth: A few sprigs of epazote, optional
